channel.title: Seomthing i dont understand

item.title: Seomthing i dont understand
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Ok right. This is a method that some server’s use.

public void playerGfx(int id, int delay) {
mask100var1 = id;
mask100var2 = delay;
mask100update = true;
updateRequired = true;
}

That makes the GFX, move with the player, correct?.. Now. I’ve tried that on like, 4 sources. All work. Then on mine, it doesn’t…

It does the animation, but no GFX for the special…

I used it liek.
playerGfx(252, 0);

:S…

Anyone got any ideas?

Read full topic
